body:
This Summer Avicus has never been so INTENSE!!!.  From Directors of Avicus and the one that directed TRANSFORMERS  MICHAEL BAY!!!! In Avicus The Movie.  Staring DarkArcher810, TheRomanTrident, Bob, ParaSpider And other Avicus Players. WITH EXPLOSIONS AND EXPLOSIONS AND FLYING PIGS . Get Ready For AVICUS THE MOVIE ( August 14 2053)

Producer: Cinnammoncroc000
Sponsors: Avicus Network, Avicus Energy Drink, Avicus Chips, And The Avicus Commentary Team #jozzmode :3
